  • Class
    Description
    AccessPolicy
    The AccessPolicy class defines a set of bitmask constants used to specify which field modifiers should be excluded during the mapping or deserialization process.
    AnnotationData<E extends Annotation,F extends Annotation>
    A data record that encapsulates metadata about annotations used in mapping processes.

    An unchecked exception that indicates a failure during the mapping process.
